name: EntertainmentPicker(Anime,Novels,andGenre)
0:
”Alexa, open Entertainment Picker”
”Alexa, start Entertainment Picker”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: entertainment picker
des:
Next time you're trying to make a difficult decision about an anime to watch or novel to read, just ask Alexa for help. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
